thread.title: Narayan plays a key role in Uppu Karuvadu
thread.title_full: Narayan plays a key role in Uppu Karuvadu - The Times of India

author: Mrinalini Sundar
title: Narayan plays a key role in Uppu Karuvadu
text:
Actor Narayan of Inidhu Inidhu and Payanam fame has played a crucial role in the upcoming film Uppu Karuvadu directed by Radha Mohan. Talking about his character, he says, "I play the role of an assistant director â€” someone who has a lot of modern ideas in filmmaking. According to the story, I work under Karunakaran, who plays the role of a director in this film."
He also has Bhooloham in his kitty in which he plays a college student, who locks horns with Jeyam Ravi. However, Narayan has one regret. "I had met director K Balachander on my last birthday and he said that he had a script and he wanted me to play a negative role in it. I wish that had happened and I really miss him now. I got his blessings and I think that is more than enough."
